awd_titl_txt: Small Grants for Exploratory Research:  Experimental        Investigation of Chaotic Trapping Pheomena in Fluids
awd_abstract_narration: Under a Small Grant for Exploratory Research, a proof-of-                       concept experiment is to be conducted. The concept is that                      unexpected phenomena can occur under certain conditions in the                  interaction between a body and a vortex convected from                          upstream past that body. In particular, it has been predicted                   theoretically that a vortex may become trapped briefly near                     the body by large transient forces induced in the interaction.                  An experimental search is planned for such trapping, for the                    case of a cylindrical obstacle.                                                                                                                                 Verification of the physical reality of the predictions would                   open a variety of opportunities for flow control.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
